channel.title: Python on JIPipe for ImageJ
channel.description: Recent content in Python on JIPipe for ImageJ

item.title: About Python nodes
item.description: Load the example pipeline. When additional processing is necessary, e.g., with the results table, Python code can also be applied. As an example, add the Python script (iterating) node (red arrow 1) to the pipeline and connect it to the Find particles node. The Script field (red rectangle 2) will, e.g., print the table into the Log window of JIPipe (red arrow 3), and puts the table into the nodeâ€™s output slot (red arrow 4).
